name: character-quiver
description: Welcome to Character Quiver – your go-to web app for swift and seamless Dungeons and Dragons character creation! Whether you're a seasoned adventurer or new to the realms of D&D, our intuitive interface guides you through selecting races, classes, and customizing backgrounds. What sets us apart? Our built-in Dice Roller adds an element of chance, injecting excitement and authenticity into your quests. Join us in crafting unforgettable characters and embarking on epic journeys. Character Quiver – where imagination meets destiny, one roll at a time!
author: Keston Rich, Lucas Gilles, Devan Ash, Stretch Spelman, Dillen Grant

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
